snippet: Sebastian Vettel took a big step toward his fourth consecutive Formula One driver’s championship, but much of the attention before and after the race was on the runner-up, Fernando Alonso.
abstract: Sebastian Vettel wins Italian Grand Prix, taking a commanding lead in the Formula One standings by claiming his sixth victory of the season.
lead_paragraph: Sebastian Vettel took a big step toward his fourth consecutive Formula One driver’s championship, but much of the attention before and after the race was on the runner-up, Fernando Alonso.

headline.main: Vettel Wins Italian Grand Prix, but Alonso Earns Cheers
headline.print_headline: Vettel Wins Italian Grand Prix, but Alonso Earns Cheers
